H0.text: Who was married to Guinevere. King Arthur

H1.text: Who was married to Guinevere. Sir Lancelot

H2.text: Who was married to Guinevere. Sir Gawain

H3.text: Who was married to Guinevere. Arthuriad

A4.text: Guinevere ... was, according to Arthurian legend, an early-medieval queen of Great Britain and the wife of King Arthur.

A5.text: Guinevere is charged with adultery on three occasions, including once when she is also accused of sorcery.

A6.text: Lancelot had an adulterous relationship with Guinevere

A7.text: Arthur's wife Guenhuuara (Guinevere) is mentioned in the context of his conquests and subsequent conflicts
